comment.text: This translation key is used to display the price per amount information in a currency format. It appears on a form component, where users can input an amount and see the corresponding price.

usage.context:
<Text fontSize="12px" className={styles.priceDescription}>
 {item.priceTitle}
 </Text>
 <div className={styles.priceContainer}>
 <Text fontSize="12px" fontWeight={600}>
 {t("PerStorage", {
 currency: formatCurrencyValue(
 language!,
 value!,
 isoCurrencySymbol!,
 0,
